ModMetaData.name: Misc. Training
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
This adds some training facilities: - Shooting Target Train up your shooting ability. Joy and training possible! - Martial Arts Dummy Train your martial arts ability. Joy and training possible! - Archery Target Your colonists like to shoot some arrows for joy. **Joy only**
(Version: 0.16.1) Language: English, German, Chinese
Thanks to duduluu now with a translation for Chinese (both)
